title_ar: ูุฑุญุจุงู ุจู ูู Bitiq.ai
content_en:
Bitiq.ai is your AI-powered trading companion. It analyzes the crypto market 24/7, identifies high-quality trade opportunities, and sends you signals directly to your dashboard or private Telegram channel.

You can:
โข Receive AI-generated trading signals in real time.
โข Use Bitiq.ai Copilot, your personal AI assistant, to analyze and plan your trades.
โข Enable AutoTrade to automatically execute signals on your connected exchange.

๐ก You stay in full control. Bitiq.ai never touches your funds โ it only provides tools and automation to help you trade smarter.

title_ar: ุงูุจุฏุก ูุน Bitiq.ai
content_en:
Step 1 โ Create Your Account
โข Visit bitiq.ai and click Sign Up.
โข Enter your name, email, and password, then accept the terms.
โข Or sign up using your Google account (no password required).

โ๏ธ Note: If you register with Google, you cannot change your password inside Bitiq.ai since it's managed by Google.

Step 2 โ Log In
After signing up, log in to access your main dashboard โ the Signal Page, where you'll see real-time trading signals and updates.

Step 3 โ Customize Your Experience
From the sidebar:
โข Switch between Light / Dark Mode
โข Choose your Language (Arabic / English)
โข Access your Profile, My Subscription, and Community sections

Invite a Friend
Invite your friends to experience Bitiq.ai โ both of you benefit.

How it works:
  โข Go to Profile โ Account โ Invite a Friend.
  โข Enter your friend's email and send the invitation.
  โข Your friend receives 3 days of full access to Bitiq.ai.
  โข Once they activate their trial, you gain 1 extra day on your own subscription.

๐ก There's no limit โ invite more friends, earn more days.

title_en: Choosing and Paying for a Plan
content_en:
Available Plans:
โข Free Plan: $0 โ 24-hour trial, limited signals, 3 Copilot messages/day
โข Monthly Plan: $59 โ Full access to Signals, Copilot, and AutoTrade
โข Lifetime Plan: $399 one-time โ Permanent access to all features + premium support

How to Subscribe:
    โข Go to Profile โ My Subscription.
    โข Choose your preferred plan (Monthly or Lifetime).
    โข You'll be redirected to OxaPay.
    โข Select your payment cryptocurrency (SOL, USDT, USDC, BTC, or ETH).
    โข After payment, you'll automatically gain full access to all features.

๐ฐ Payments are secure through crypto. No auto-renewal โ renew manually when your plan expires. No refunds on crypto transactions.

title_ar: ุฑุจุท ุญุณุงุจ Telegram
content_en:
Paid users can receive instant trade alerts through private Telegram channels.

How to Connect:
โข Go to Profile โ Account โ Setup Telegram.
โข Copy your One-Time Code and click the Telegram Bot Link.
โข Open the bot in Telegram and send your code.
โข Choose your preferred signal language (Arabic or English).
โข You'll be automatically added to your private signal channel.

Each Telegram signal includes: trading pair, entry price, TP/SL, leverage suggestion, AI summary, and AI Score (AโC).

Bitiq.ai signals are created by our AI engine and verified by experienced traders. They cover 250+ crypto pairs across 15m, 1h, 4h, and 1D timeframes.

Example:
โข Pair: BTCUSDT
โข Type: LONG
โข Entry: 105,250
โข Stop Loss: 104,800
โข Take Profits: 106,000 / 106,700 / 107,500
โข AI Score: A (Strong Setup)

โ๏ธ Disclaimer: Bitiq.ai signals are insights, not financial advice. Always manage your risk and never invest more than you can afford to lose.

title_ar: ุงุณุชุฎุฏุงู ุงููุณุงุนุฏ ุงูุฐูู Copilot
content_en:
Copilot is your personal AI assistant. Ask it questions like:
โข Is this signal still valid?
โข What's the best risk level for this trade?
โข How should I adjust my targets?
โข What's the on-chain trend for BTC?
โข I have 1000 USDT โ what's the market sentiment for long-term holding?

Free users: 3 messages/day. Paid users: unlimited Copilot access included.

โ๏ธ Copilot provides analysis โ not execution or financial advice.

title_ar: ุฅุนุฏุงุฏ ุงูุชุฏุงูู ุงูุชููุงุฆู AutoTrade
content_en:
AutoTrade executes trades automatically based on verified AI signals, while your funds remain in your exchange account.

Supported Exchanges: Binance, Bybit, OKX, KuCoin.

How It Works:
 โข Go to Dashboard โ AutoTrade.
 โข Connect your exchange using API keys.
 โข Set your capital allocation per trade.
 โข AutoTrade uses the Stop Loss, Take Profit, and Leverage from each signal.
 โข Enable AutoTrade.

๐ก Let data drive your trades โ stay consistent, trust the system, and focus on strategy.

Trading cryptocurrencies involves real risk and potential capital loss. Bitiq.ai supports your decisions through data and automation โ but never replaces your judgment.

โ๏ธ Always remember:
โข Bitiq.ai is not a financial advisor.
โข No tool guarantees profit or removes risk.
โข You're responsible for all trades.

Need assistance? We're here to help.

Email: hello@bitiq.ai
Website: https://www.bitiq.ai
Typical response time: within 24 hours (business days).

Legal & Risk Disclosure, Privacy Policy, and Terms of Service are available at the bottom of https://www.bitiq.ai.
